full_summary:
### Project Leader/Executive Senior (Level 3) - Tender Announcement

**Invitation to Propose**

The Department of National Defence (DND) is inviting pre-qualified suppliers to submit their proposals for the provision of Task and Solutions Professional Services (TSPS) under the existing Supply Arrangement (SA) E60ZT-18TSPS.

**Project Overview**

The project requires the services of one (1) Project Leader/Executive Senior (Level 3) with expertise in project management to support the objectives of the Fighter Capability Office (FCO) within DND. The successful contractor will be responsible for defining and monitoring the scope, deliverables, and implementation conditions for the Department's future fighter capability requirements.

**Scope of Work**

The scope of work includes:

* Project management services
* Human resource services
* Business consulting and change management
* Travel to DND sites within and outside of Canada

**Security Requirements**

The chosen supplier must hold a valid Secret security clearance.

**Contract Duration**

The anticipated contract duration is for two (2) years, with three (3) irrevocable option years.

**Location**

The work will be performed at the National Defence Headquarters in Ottawa, Ontario.

**Estimated Level of Effort**

The estimated level of effort for this project is 240 days per year.

**Proposal Guidelines**

Interested suppliers must have already been pre-qualified under Tier 1 for the category 3.3 Project Leader/Executive Senior (Level 3) under the SA E60ZT-18TSPS. Proposal documents will be circulated to the pre-qualified suppliers via email from the DND Point of Contact (DND POC).

**Submission Deadline**

Submissions must be received by September 9, 2022 at 14:00 EST.

**Point of Contact**

For further information, please contact Sharon Sally, DND POC at sharon.sally@forces.gc.ca. [819] 939-8990

**Notice**

This tender announcement is subject to the Crown Contracts Act and the Trade Agreements. The Project Manager is available to answer questions and provide clarification on the project scope and requirements. Please contact the DND POC for more information. [End of Notice]
